name: Chem Balancer
tagline: A simple way to balance chemical equations using antlr4.
body:
### Chem Balancer
Chem Balancer is just a simple way to balance chemical equations online. There's an online front-end, downloadable source code, as well as a public API.

### Accessing the online front-end
Just go to [this website](https://chem-balancer.herokuapp.com/).

### Using the API
Check out the source code of this [example client](https://github.com/MichaelSnowden/chem-balancer/blob/master/src/main/resources/spark/template/freemarker/index.ftl).

Send a `GET` request to `https://chem-balancer.herokuapp.com/solve` with the parameter `equation` set to a string containing a valid equation that follows [this grammar](https://github.com/MichaelSnowden/chem-balancer/blob/master/src/main/antlr4/com/michaelsnowden/juniper/ChemicalEquation.g4).

```
$.get("https://chem-balancer.herokuapp.com/solve", {"equation": $("#equation").val()}, function (data) {
    $("#answer").text(data);
});
```
